function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE

gbns with antiviral characteristics may lead to ineffective applications and potential risks.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dependence on new nanomaterials and risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Development of graphene oxide go incorporated cotton fabrics as antimicrobial materials may introduce new risks if the effectiveness of the material is not
